brand_identity.name: Ramadan Calendar
universal_rules: Avoid high-saturation 'digital' colors (no neon green/bright orange).
Use 'Jewel Tones' for accents (Emerald, Sapphire, Ruby, Gold) on neutral backgrounds.
Generous whitespace (padding) to create a sense of luxury.
Roundness: Use rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl for cards to feel organic and friendly.
Typography: Contrast Serif headings (Tradition) with Sans-serif body (Modernity).

usage.headings: Use Playfair Display for all page titles and greetings. Capitalize normally.
usage.subheadings: Use Outfit for section headers. Use uppercase with tracking-widest for small labels.
usage.body: Use Outfit for all paragraphs and UI elements.

host.description: For events where the user is HOSTING (Besuch). Use Deep Teal/Emerald tones. Represents Generosity, Grounding, Authority.

guest.description: For events where the user is INVITED (Einladung). Use Warm Gold/Amber tones. Represents Warmth, Celebration, Light.

buttons.primary: bg-[#0F4C5C] text-white hover:bg-[#134E4A] shadow-md rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-[#FFFBEB] text-[#92400E] hover:bg-[#FEF3C7] border border-[#FDE68A] rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

instructions_to_main_agent.tailwind_config_update: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the color palette with the new 'brand', 'host', and 'guest' colors. Add the specific font families.
instructions_to_main_agent.css_update: Update index.css to set the new CSS variables for --background, --foreground, --primary, etc. Ensure the font imports for Playfair Display and Outfit are present.
instructions_to_main_agent.component_refactor: Refactor existing components to use the new rounded-2xl, shadow-sm, and the new color utilities. Specifically check the 'Calendar' and 'Dashboard' pages to implement the Host/Guest distinction using the new 'status' colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.navigation_update: Update the bottom navigation to use the new glassmorphism style and active states (Active: Text-Brand-Primary + subtle bg).
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text combinations meet WCAG AA contrast (4.5:1). The new darker Host/Guest text colors are designed for this.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
